references.paper_title: Quantum bridge analytics i: a tutorial on formulating and using qubo models
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational tutorial on QUBO models, which are central to the research presented in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Quantum bridge analytics ii: Qubo-plus, network optimization and combinatorial chaining for asset exchange
references.reason: This paper expands on QUBO models by introducing QUBO-plus, relevant to the advanced methods explored in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Learning combinatorial optimization algorithms over graphs
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in the field of learning-based combinatorial optimization, providing a foundation for the neural network approaches discussed.

references.paper_title: Heuristic algorithms based on deep reinforcement learning for quadratic unconstrained binary optimization
references.reason: This paper represents prior work by some of the same authors, establishing a baseline for comparison and informing the current research.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a crucial component of the proposed model, which forms the foundation for the model's feature extraction.
